Now, how to structure this in C.

First, let's handle the first part (File 1's logic):

The first part needs to read a string S, check that it has exactly two distinct characters, each appearing exactly twice. So in C, I can read the input string, count the frequency of each character, then check the conditions.

For counting, since C doesn't have a Counter, I can use an array of size 256 (assuming ASCII) to count each character's occurrence. Then collect the counts, check the number of unique characters (non-zero counts) is exactly 2, and each of those counts is 2. Then, if those conditions are met, the first output is "Yes", else "No".
